bosathun ha sahajatha (ekwa upan) pudgalayan ha wasthuanagarika dharmapalathumarogabadha pilibanda budu asinwaradata danduwamnanda theraniyapujasanaya udu sithin wandana kirimen palak nowe;wanasi yana bauddha urumayanawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawaganwathura pradarshanaya kala anathma darshanayabudu karunawen sanasumalath asarana bamunu piyaraskalayuthu niyama margopakaranaaaloko udapadibhikshuthwaye sima danagena kriya karannamaha suthasoma jathakayasanwarayatharunyaya ha bududahamanayiwala shri dhammarathana daham pasalamage mawbimathrushnawa shokayata hethuweuththara himiyan ula matha hinda wu pawaajan brahmawanso maha therun wahanseabisaruliyak nisa maranayata kapawu situputhrayasathutehi rahasalo wada sangarawamala miniyak asurin bhawanawa praguna kirimamaniyan dewura matha hinduwa gena samudraya tharanaya kala punyawantha puthrayamudithawasathuta hari puduma deyakamugoda jayasumanarama purana maha wiharayayam kaleka apa maha bosathanan wahanse lumbini nam uyanehi wesak masa pura pasaloswak po dinayehi upan sekda ewelehima rahula mathawaya, channa amathi ya, kaludayi amathi ya, kanthaka nam ashwa rajaya ya, aswaththa bodhi wrukshaya, sathara maha nidhanaya yana me wasthu da pahala wiya.upathe sita buddhathwayata pathwanathuru wiwidha awasthawala di unwahanse pilibanda nan wadarum siduwimwaladi me pudgalayan ha sthana ee udara jiwithaya ha sabandi pawathunu bawa pene.

adhikaranaya hamuwe warada piligath wirakodiyana sthri dushana naduwe withthikaruta wasara 6ka barapathala sira danduwam niyama kala wayambaa palath bada kurunagala mahadhikarana winisuru el. yu. jayasuriya mahatha eki sira danduwama wasara 20 kata athhituwamin rupiyal 5000 ka dadayak gewana lesata withthikaruta niyama karana ladi.dada mudal saha sira danduwamata amatharawa agathiyata path kanthawata rupiyal laksha eka hamaraka wandiyak gewana lesatada niyoga kaleya.ema dada mudal saha wandi nogewwoth thawath wasara 4 kin sira danduwam dirga karana bawada winisuruwaraya kiweya.2006/06/26 dina ho eeta aasanna dinayakadi kuliyapitiya polis bala pradeshaye wirakodiyane wayasa awurudu 26 ka ekdaru mawak dewathawak dushanaya kirime chodanawa yatathe sakakaru me naduwen chodana laba sitiyoya.dada mudal saha wandi gewimata thama sewadayakaya kamaththen sitina baw withthiye nithignyawaraya mehidi kiya sitiyeya.eyata awasara dun winisuruwaraya mudal gewa enathek ohu adhikarana shalawe randawa ganna lesata bandhanagara niladharinta niyama kaleya.dada mudal usawiyata gewu withthikaru wandi mudala rupiyal eklaksha panas daha kanthawage namin jathika ithiri kirime bankuwe thampath kota ladupatha adhikaranayata idiripath kaleya..
